siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: [caption id=“attachment_530” align=“aligncenter” width=“750”] Iowa Twist of Lemon Bunker after tree fell on it.[/caption] Dear Listener, After some quick followup on Aldi and their lack of maraschino cherries, we get into why we missed last week’s episode. Eastern Iowa looks like…

frontmatter.title: Jon Lived Through a Derecho, whatever that is.
